answers.answer: Hey, how far along are u? I'm almost 39 weeks n getting induce Monday for medical reason. This is my 3rd pregnancy n I'm finally getting my lil girl. Thanks n good luck on ur pregnancy too.

Lol I'm only 9wks+6 I have a long ways to go n I can't wait I'm due august 16th. I shld find out next month wt I'm having I'm hoping for a princess bt I jst want a healthy baby nomatter the sex. Was this pregnancy easy for u??

Lol. I had preeclampsia with my last pregnancy n I switched to a different ob when I found out I was pregnant again. This ob was on top of their stuff n my bp was good n I don't have preeclampsia with this one but since I had it b4 they don't want me going pass my due date. This pregnancy is killing me lol my body aches n I go to the bathroom all the time. I guess that's what happens in ur 3rd trimester. Is this ur first pregnancy? I hope u get ur lil girl too n keep me posted. If u have a girl what are u going to name her? How old r u n where r u from?

Yes I'm a ftm n this will be my only child we just wanted one and he alrdy has an 8 year old and if I have a girl we chose jayana londyn williams bt if its a boy he will be junior. And I'm 22 from va. What about u??
Oh ok I understand. I'm 27 yrs old n I live in va too. What part of va are u from?

question: Congratulations to all the mommies tht recently had their babies or very close to having thm I wish u all well and good luck. I can't wait to be were u are!!
title: congratulations
